revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Philips |model=Fidelio SoundSphere |revision=(DS6800W) |fcc_date=09/20/2011 |availability=now |type=audio streamer, wireless speakers, |fcc_id=BOU-DS6800W |ic_id=135M-DS6800W |pcb_id=323A70102297 |pwr_v=20 |pwr_amp=2.8 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=BridgeCo |cpu1_model=DM870 |cpu1_cspeed=240 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=H27U1G8F2BTR |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H57V1262GTR |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial= |jtag= |wi1_chip1_brand=BridgeCo |wi1_chip1_model=DM870 |wi1_chip2_brand=Thomson |wi1_chip2_model=6201C |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |eth_none=true |flags=AirPlay, schematics, |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=Philips Fidelio AirPlay |default_ssid_regex=^Philips Fidelio AirPlay$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:07:F5 }} {{TagLine|Fidelio SoundSphere Mini Wireless Speakers DS6800W}} :''with AirPlay USB port for play/charging 50W'' *[https://www.philips.com.hk/en/c-p/DS6800W_37/- Support page] (DS6800W/37) {{â€¢}} [https://www.philips.com.hk/en/c-p/DS6800W_10/- Support page] (DS6800W/10)
"CR870-2I" is on the label on the main module (with "NM-102-BB", :"323A70102297" silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos).
When in Assisted Wi-Fi Setup mode, the device broadcasts with an SSID :of "Philips Fidelio AirPlay" and is accessible at 192.168.1.1.
RAM and Flash parts are the parts listed in the schematics. :The wireless OUI may be 00:07:F5.
*[https://www.cnet.com/products/philips-fidelio-soundsphere-ds6800w-speakers-wireless/ Spec. on '''C|NET''']
